FuncDef: The group-member command adds a member to a QoS group. The group-member command adds a member to a QoS group. By default, no member is added to a QoS group.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies VLANs added to a QoS group.
The keyword to specifies a VLAN range that includes all VLANs between the start and end VLANs.
For the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ:The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.
For the CE6885-LL (low latency mode):The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 1023.

Specifies interfaces added to a QoS group.
The keyword to specifies an interface range that includes all interfaces between the start and end interfaces.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the source IP address added to the QoS group.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Indicates the mask of an IP address.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Indicates the mask length of the IP address.

 NOTE: This parameter is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
The value is an integer in the range from 1 to 32.

ExtraInfo: After creating a QoS group, you can add all VLANs to which the same traffic policy is applied to the QoS group.After creating a QoS group, you can add all interfaces to which the same traffic policy is applied to the QoS group.
